page.title: 18GAMES WE PLAY
page.content: Killer Wink: is a game that is easy to understand. Everybody stands in a circle.Somebody out of the circle volunteers to be the detective, and she goes and hides. While she is hiding somebody is picked to be the killer.Everybody decides on one person.The person who is chosen walks round the outside of the circle and she has to tap someone on the back and go back to her place. The detective is called out, the detective walks round the inside of the circle, while she is doing this the person that has been tapped on yhe back must begin to wink at the people that are making the circle without the detective seeing them. When the people see somebody winking at them they must fall to the ground, but be careful, if the detective sees you she will say"It's you".The person left is it.
